description: Try our easy to follow Toasted Baguette With Cherry Salsa & Brie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Toasted Baguette With Cherry Salsa & Brie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lime, rind finely grated and juiced

recipeInstructions.text: Combine chopped cherries, lime rind, lime juice, snipped chives and balsamic vinegar in a serving bowl. Set aside for 10 minutes to allow flavours to develop.

Meanwhile, heat a chargrill over medium-high heat. Spray baguette slices with oil. Cook for 1-2 minutes each side until lightly charred. Pile toast onto a platter and serve with cherry salsa and brie.
